name: Virtual Pregnant Mom: Happy Family Fun
name_original: Virtual Pregnant Mom: Happy Family Fun
description:
Pregnant Mom Virtual Family Happy fun home is story of a pregnant virtual mommy. This Happy Family game adventure providing you as virtual pregnant mom or life of a pregnant virtual mom simulator has to comfort her virtual family while performing numerous household activities with lot of fun & entertainment. Mommy is pregnant and wants help from virtual high school boy and virtual girl in happy family game activities. Make space for upcoming newborn baby after the surgery operation of virtual pregnant mom. The pregnant virtual mommy is busy in routine life in home and happy for new baby but now she is feeling a lot of pain and is very sick so you have to call the nearest hospital and take her there so she can see if pregnant mom needs pregnancy operation surgery or not!! Virtual Pregnant Mom: Happy Family Fun is a complete adventure simulator of a happy virtual family with lots of playable characters like virtual daddy, virtual high school boy and girl. This is fusion of virtual mom games made for the lovers of virtual mom family games.

Play as super mom in happy family home game and perform daily routine tasks. The daily tasks of the virtual mom include cooking food, virtual shopping at the fashion mall for new born baby as virtual mom babysitter. Do gardening and cleaning house but don’t forget to visiting doctor and help virtual husband then most importantly getting kids ready for the high school. Virtual Family Pregnant Mom Happy Family Fun simulation game you need to perform as supermom and virtual pregnant mom at the same time and performs realistic virtual household activities with mommy care and performing housekeeping in different rooms of the virtual house along with visiting supermarket for purchasing grocery and medicines for emergency baby birth with pregnant woman surgery. So combination of family games with baby with a big house will give you complete newborn baby and pregnant mom pleasure.

In virtual mom family games, play the complete package of among virtual mom games and paramount of happy family games. Let’s start this pregnant woman operation simulation in ultimate family game with lots of home based working tasks. In this happy family game, get engaged in super crazy routine life. In virtual pregnant mom happy family game, take care of yourself and your whole virtual family by performing household chores with multitasking housekeeping scenarios or preparing kids for the high school as super pregnant virtual mom. Go to the nearest hospital for routined pregnancy checkup and see your healthy ultrasound. Take care of your newborn baby as an expert virtual mommy. Before surgery follow some caring steps including taking fresh juices and medicines to assure if the virtual pregnant mom is not sick and ready for surgery with pregnancy games for girl.

Features of Virtual Pregnant Mom: Happy Family Fun

• Perform all household chores & take care of high school kids & virtual dad.
• Complete pregnant woman operation game with care of newborn baby.
• Detailed gameplay with loads of virtual mom games 3D missions.
• Mom babysitter mode with simplified family women controls.
• High quality HD graphics & realistic virtual family animations.
• Addictive gameplay & amazing background music in happy family game.
